reviewText: I can't believe you can't buy this film.  I am not  a surfer and I found it fantastic.  I saw it years ago I think on Netflix.  Whoever is sitting on it is either a moron or an A-hole.  I know nothing about marketing but I bet I could market this to relative success.
Jeff Clark is iconic in the surf world and is the master of Mavericks.  This is a really informative, well done and captivating film on the Mavericks - I highly recommend the movie and the seller.
